title: aruNOdayam varumO
sahitya:
aruNOdayam varumO en vAzhkkaiyum Ananda nilai perumO shiva guruvE


anupallavi

  iruLaghattai mAyaiyil Engi Engit-tavittun aruLudayattai dinam ArvamuDan kUvinEn


caraNam    AdhArat-tAmaraigaL alarndu shivam kamazha Ayira vidazh pUvil amarat-tEn parugiDa
mEdini engum un jyOti mukham kANa vEdap-poruLin anubhUti nalam peravE
